Html: First off great control, this is probably the best SL coverflow I've seen out there.  I'm having one issue though... the first version (on the download page, that has Previous / Next buttons, etc) worked great with wiring up a WCF service and to pass Image URL's to the flowControl.  I really like the latest version (47814) though, with the border highlights, cornering, and titles etc.  So I've been trying to get that working.  My WCF call is working as expected, but the images never load, just the titles.  Looking at Fiddler, it never attempts to get the image resource files like it did with the first version of the coverflow control.  What am I missing here?  Is it something to do with the new "ConvertURL" functionality or Caching?
